attributes.action: Rename the common cold. The sniffles
attributes.background: Everyone knows what having a cold is but it aint what it actually sounds like. In reality when you have a cold you usually sniff alot so why not call it the sniffles. It would be much easier to understand what it is as well. I feel that itll benefit people now and for generations to come

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for the name of the common cold.
